Verification Mobile Application Project Description This Project provides the Dataflow Verification for different client of Dataflow Group It contains Login Management Creating Profile updating 2018 Project Name Retailer and Remittance Project Description 1 Retailer project provides the facility for Cash Transaction using IMPS NEFT and RTGS It also provides the facility for Cash Withdrawal Recharge Open Bank Account Training for Retailer Transaction History Low MCash SOA TDS and Retailer Point for the CMS Enabled 2 Remittance project provides the facility to send money using My Airtel App by Western Union Role Java Developer Technologies Java 18 Spring Boot Spring Batch Apache Kafka Struts 2 Hibernate Kong API Gateway JPA Angular Swagger and Aerospike Server Web logic Apache Tomcat Worked on Apache Kafka using Spring Boot Worked on Kong API gateway for Western Union and Retailer Point Toll Global Logistics July 2017 to October 2017 Project Name Toll Project Description Toll Global Logistics provides specialist contract logistics It offers transport warehousing and valueadded services including freight Transport services distribution services and supply chain services Authenticated users have an ability to create edit review and delete the shipment or view previous shipments created through My Toll My Toll Contains also the Finance Module where Authenticated user can see review and download the Finance report Role Java Developer Technologies Java 18 Spring Boot Life Ray JPA Restful Web Services Swagger Server Apache Tomcat Database MySql Responsibilities Description This application is a new responsive stafftravelbacom and idtravelbacom application This application is developed using Restful Web services and Angular Js This application is a single page web app to address needs of the user In this application Staff Travel and other carrier member can book a ticket manage cancel and refund the booking Role Full Stack Developer Technologies Core Java Spring REST SOAP Angular JS JavaScript Ajax HTML CSS Server Web logic Database Oracle 10g Responsibilities Written Restful Web Services for Staff Travel Web Application Written Rest Client to
